qas.question: What feature makes the Marshalls susceptible to harm due to rising sea levels?
Who said that the Marshalls are the most endangered nation in the world?
Why are the Marshall Islands the most endangered nation on Earth?

context: Due to <a0_0>its very low elevation<a0_0/>, the Marshall Islands are threatened by the potential effects of sea level rise. According to <a1_0>the president of Nauru<a1_0/>, the Marshall Islands are the most endangered nation in the world due to <a2_0>flooding from climate change<a2_0/>.
